UniprotID	A5D6W6
Accession	A5D6W6;Q8IUQ7
EntryName	FITM1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Fat storage-inducing transmembrane protein 1 (Fat-inducing protein 1)
GeneName	FITM1 FIT1
Length	292
Function	Plays an important role in the formation of lipid droplets (LDs) which are storage organelles at the center of lipid and energy homeostasis (By similarity) (PubMed:18160536). Directly binds to diacylglycerol (DAGs) and triacylglycerol (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum membrane
